example.text: The Biden Administration wants to deploy 1500 troops to the border to process paperwork — NOT fight the border crisis!! Texas is taking it into its own hands. [[url]]
BORDER SECURITY IS NATIONAL SECURITY! My GOP colleagues and I just passed the Secure the Border Act, one step closer to making America safe again!

As physician to three Presidents, I know more than anyone that Biden is cognitively UNFIT to be Commander-in-Chief. I led my colleagues in a fourth letter to Biden demanding he undergo a cognitive exam & release the results! ASAP! [[url]]
The Biden Administration wants to deploy 1500 troops to the border to process paperwork — NOT fight the border crisis!! Texas is taking it into its own hands. [[url]]

While on the Agriculture Committee I plan to prioritize the agriculture industry as a national security issue. That is why this week I was proud to introduce the Foreign Adversary Risk Management Act, or FARM Act.
BORDER SECURITY IS NATIONAL SECURITY! My GOP colleagues and I just passed the Secure the Border Act, one step closer to making America safe again!
